comments:
Version: 3.2.0
Build id: I20060301-0800

If you define a consolePatternMatchListeners extension with no enablement you get the attached exception.  This might be a PDE problem/enhancement as the extension point schema does specify that you must have an enablement, but the manifest editor doesn't seem to pick this up as an error. (If i am reading the schema correctly)

Moving to PDE UI. The enablement expression is a required attribute.

This was fixed as part of Mike's rework of schemas in 3.3.

You'll now get an error like:
A minimum of 1 'enablement' elements must be specified.
